S.FORM: kuhkuh kasasumay :kasazumaay aadupan Animalia sacumud :sacumud dami'ay aadupan Mollusca uzip :uzip bili ku sapiculil Gastropoda mata :mata dawmiay uzip Architaenioglossa pulung :pulung samataan kuhkuh Viviparoidea samataan :samataan kuhkuh Viviparidae kuhkuh caay kuyni u sapamataan a kuhkuh dada' "mitesakay nipangangan Viviparidae" u bili ku sapiculil dawmiay' uzai aadupan. palalecad hatiza u taludu' katabaki, sipudac ku banges cisataheb. kacumuli sapamata kuhkuh aadipad a nipangangan. yadah ku i abesaay nanumay a butingan manamuh mukan tu kuhkuh. labu nu uzip a kuhkuh madayum sicilekay. kasazuma nu kuhkuh tungus malumanay nuayawan silingasaay a uzip, sapamata kuhkuh imahini u dawmi'ay uzip a sakaput, pakala tu 17 a tungusay , cacay a lasubu a masasengiay . tungusay kimulmulay kuhkuh 圓田螺屬(Cipangopaludina), (Cipangopaludina chinensis),滇池圓田螺 (Cipangopaludina dianchiensis), 瀕危稜田螺(Cipangopaludina miyagii), Cipangopaludina compactus, Cipangopaludina formosensis, 石田螺屬(Sinotaia),石田螺 (Sinotaia quadrata),雙帶石田螺(Sinotaia lapidea),螺紋石田螺(Sinotaia quadrata heudei),Sinotaia quadrata aeruginosa. tungusay kimulmulay kuhkuh (Cipangopaludina) tungusay malumanay nikalukan umah tungusay kuhkuh, pasu mahiniay canacanan nu mauzipay: Cung-kuw kimulmulan kuhkuh (kimmulmulay a kuhkuh, 中國圓田螺) (Cipangopaludina chinensis), tyen-ce a taku u kimulmulay a kuhkuh (滇池圓田螺, Cipangopaludina dianchiensis), kalihanawan u masamucuyay a kuhkuh (瀕危稜田螺, Cipangopaludina miyagii), Cipangopaludina compactus, Cipangopaludina formosensis, tungusay masabucu'yay ku kimulmul a kuhkuh (石田螺屬, Sinotaia), masabucuyay kimulmulay kuhkuh (masataliyukay ku kamucuy a kuhkuh, 環稜螺) (石田螺, Sinotaia quadrata), tusaay kasataluyuk nu masabucuyay a kuhkuh (雙帶石田螺, Sinotaia lapidea), masataluyuk ku mucuy nu ikul a kuhkuh (螺紋石田螺, Sinotaia quadrata heudei), Sinotaia quadrata aeruginosa. ,殼高約4cm. . kimulmulay kuhkuh kuki' masamulmul ku ti'kuk, kimulmul ku satungdud nu uzip, laway nu kuki' masakimulmul. kuki' makulah ku kulit anucaay sa makulaha ku landaw, lameneng takelal, talakau nu kuki' 4cm. sataheb a pudac mala kulahay ku kalawlaw nu kulit izaw ku masamulmulay a kulit masabalucu' ku kamulmul nu kulit a zazan. masabucuyay kuhkuh singangan aca tu masabucuyay kuhkuha anucaay sa masataliyukay ku kamucuy a kuhkuh, kuki' ka adidi'ay tu kimulmulan kuhkuh nika masatanayu' ku kuki', tapiingan a bucuy, u kuki' duuduuta ku kaladaway anucaay sa sakulakulahan ku kaladaway, 2.5cm ku talakaw nu kuki'. kaliwaliwah i kananaman kaliwaliwah nu kuhkuh mahamin izaw i kitakit, maazih tu i Uw-cuw, Ya-cuw, Bey-cuw Tung- Nan-ya atu Pey-me-cuw a nuwalian atu Ku-pa a kakitizaan a sauwac, taku atu laku liwliw nu abesaay a nanum. tunu wawa sa. manamuh ku kuhkuh mauzip i lanulanu'an, i labu nu nanum damay anucaay sa u laclac mala u kakanen. uzip nu ulang kawili a ngawa' u sapitakis tu uzang. i bili misati'kuk. misalalami' miciyan tu kuhkuh u kanamuhan nu Cuw-kuw nutimulan asuay a kakanan. Kuwng-si Liw-cuw walay a kuhkuh u nisakabian a kuhkuh. nika nu canacanan ku sapalamel, kanca ngaayen ku kuhkuh, sakasaan a malalid nu cilekay. amalaheci . Taywan nauyaan u "kimulmulay kuhkuh" amalaheci ku nidipat pipahabayan, taneng henay a yadah ku nipahabanay, nipahabanay katukuh siwa a kacakat. ayzaay tu a mihcaan Nung-wi-huy pipahabayan sakalamkam sa mikawaw misuped pahabay tu sapaluma sa, nacila (cacay a demiad) pasubana' malaheci tu ku nipahabay tu kimulmulay kuhkuhk, yadah satu ku kuhkuh, u nipahabayay kacakat katukuh i siwaay. imahin pipahabayan patahkal a pacakay tu canacananan a kuhkuhan, mibangbang tu binawlan mikawaw pahabay anucaay pakayadah tu kuhkuh, anuayaw adasay mala u cayay tu ka azih i Taywan, u siacaay a nilacu nu uyaayay tu nu mauzipay, katukuh tu nipahabay atu nipacakay asinilacul tu. . caay ku nipasapaiyuan atu nu tauay a kuhkuh, kimulmulay a kuhkuh umahay zumaay a kuhkuh maselep tu. . kimulmulay kuhkuh nu Taywan tabakiay nu yaanay tu abesaay nanum a kuhkuh, satabakiay katukuh 7-8 hunan, imahini u makanay tu nu tademaw amin u masabucuyay kimulmulay kuhkuh, u satabakiay a uzip 3-4 hunan dada'. pipahabayan a mikeliday ci Cen-cin-zu hini sa, makay "cacay a kuhkuh siwa kaysing ku kabi" uynian a kamu taneng maazihay tu, iayaw kimulmulay kuhkuh nu Taywan u kahenulan nu nanumay a kakanan. sangaleh malukay syakayay mahizatu, ayzaay tu a mihcaan namapatadas nu tademaw, masazuma tu ku liwliw caay tu kaazih ku nu tiniay tu nuyaanay tu nanumay mauzipay nu tauay aca a kuhkuh. satu, pipahabayay kalamkam satu mikawaw tu kimulmulay kuhkuh, kahenulan a misupet tu tiniay mauzipay i nanum, misuped pahabay. iayaw kimulmulay kuhkuh angangan mauzip i taku, kapisun a laku atu nipalumaan tu tipus a umah. pipahabayay sakatusa nu mikeliday mitelacay a tademaw ci Cen-kuwn-zu pipudac niza u kimulmulay kuhkuh tusa ku angangan kahini kalamkam a masele, saka cacay malukay ku azihen, pasapaiyu mapauning tu ku nanum caay tu kauzip ku kuhkuhk, sakatusa bu-su'-lu a kuhkuhan macacabi' tu nu tauay a mauzipay, u kalamkam a siwawa sa, cacay ku bu-su'-lu cacay a mihcaan nilecuhan tulu a mangan ku kuhkuh, cacay ku kimulmulay kuhkuh cacay a mihcaan 200 dada' ku nilecuhan a kuhkuh. iayaw "ayaw nu 1971 a mihcaan" i umah yadah ku pisapudan tu kakanan a kuhkuh, mipudac itawya taneng a mahini sa. kasumamadanay a cilis i kaelacad izaw tu kunisuped tu nanum, caay padamek henay atu caay henay pisapaiyu. kahenulan u kakuti' nu nanum, malecaday a cilis, sadingsingan, balangbangan tusa a puu' kasikuhkuhan, u lalud kalahadan nu bu-suw-lu. sayhan u kuhkuh u tatungus pahabay u akuti' i 23-28℃. pahabayan a kakitizaan kuhkuh icelang ku nikauzip atu icelang mitena' tu imelang, i sinanumay a cilis, laku, taku taneng mipazeng pahabay, u zuma i taku han pahabay, misabacalbacal tu taku tabakiay adidi'ay pasasizuma pahabay, tamelacay a taku, nisulimetan a taku ku sapahabay, u tesek nu kailabu labu kacacayat tu akuti' nu kasienawan kasapi' nu lalud. nika paayaw tu kaliyuhan a sapacilal, u kailabu nu nanum sakapahay i 70cm, mahiza sa pasalilel ku liwliw, sacaay pilaliw nu kuhkuh. i hekal nu nanum taneng pahabay tu munabaway a lutuk, kakanan nu kuhkuh, sa pahecek han i teban tu auk sazepitan nu damay mulangaw, kakanan nu kuhkuh, papahanhanan nu kuhkuh atu kasiti'kukan. pahabay tu sapal a kawaw nanilisimetay ku taku, u zuma mipili' i 4-11 a bulad malingatu pahabay tu sapul. paymihcaan tu 6-9 a bulad u puu' nu kasibekan nu kuhkuh a siti'kuk, katukuh i Nan-tuw a kuwan Pu-li a sauwac anucaay sa tayza i Pu-li a iciba micakay tu kimulmulay a kuhkuh. kilul tu nipalalecad 2:1 ku uzang ulang, pakayni i pipili' tu 15-20g ku uzang a kuhkuh pazeng han i taku, payli-bang-mi ku nanum pazeng han tu 10 a kuhkuhan uzang a kuhkuh taneng tu, adidi'ay a kuhkuh caliway tu cacay a mihcaan kunipahabay taneng tu alaen pacakay. malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan

kohkoh kasasomay :kasazomaay aadopan Animalia sacomod :sacomod dami'ay aadopan Mollosca ozip :ozip bili ko sapicolil Gastropoda mata :mata dawmiay ozip Architaenioglossa polong :polong samataan kohkoh Viviparoidea samataan :samataan kohkoh Viviparidae kohkoh caay koyni o sapamataan a kohkoh dada' "mitesakay nipangangan Viviparidae" o bili ko sapicolil dawmiay' ozai aadopan. palalecad hatiza o talodo' katabaki, sipodac ko banges cisataheb. kacomoli sapamata kohkoh aadipad a nipangangan. yadah ko i abesaay nanomay a botingan manamoh mokan to kohkoh. labo no ozip a kohkoh madayom sicilekay. kasazoma no kohkoh tongos malomanay noayawan silingasaay a ozip, sapamata kohkoh imahini o dawmi'ay ozip a sakapot, pakala to 17 a tongosay , cacay a lasobo a masasengiay . tongosay kimolmolay kohkoh 圓田螺屬(Cipangopalodina), (Cipangopalodina chinensis),滇池圓田螺 (Cipangopalodina dianchiensis), 瀕危稜田螺(Cipangopalodina miyagii), Cipangopalodina compactos, Cipangopalodina formosensis, 石田螺屬(Sinotaia),石田螺 (Sinotaia qoadrata),雙帶石田螺(Sinotaia lapidea),螺紋石田螺(Sinotaia qoadrata heodei),Sinotaia qoadrata aeroginosa. tongosay kimolmolay kohkoh (Cipangopalodina) tongosay malomanay nikalokan omah tongosay kohkoh, paso mahiniay canacanan no maozipay: Cong-kow kimolmolan kohkoh (kimmolmolay a kohkoh, 中國圓田螺) (Cipangopalodina chinensis), tyen-ce a tako o kimolmolay a kohkoh (滇池圓田螺, Cipangopalodina dianchiensis), kalihanawan o masamocoyay a kohkoh (瀕危稜田螺, Cipangopalodina miyagii), Cipangopalodina compactos, Cipangopalodina formosensis, tongosay masaboco'yay ko kimolmol a kohkoh (石田螺屬, Sinotaia), masabocoyay kimolmolay kohkoh (masataliyokay ko kamocoy a kohkoh, 環稜螺) (石田螺, Sinotaia qoadrata), tosaay kasataloyok no masabocoyay a kohkoh (雙帶石田螺, Sinotaia lapidea), masataloyok ko mocoy no ikol a kohkoh (螺紋石田螺, Sinotaia qoadrata heodei), Sinotaia qoadrata aeroginosa. ,殼高約4cm. . kimolmolay kohkoh koki' masamolmol ko ti'kok, kimolmol ko satongdod no ozip, laway no koki' masakimolmol. koki' makolah ko kolit anocaay sa makolaha ko landaw, lameneng takelal, talakao no koki' 4cm. sataheb a podac mala kolahay ko kalawlaw no kolit izaw ko masamolmolay a kolit masabaloco' ko kamolmol no kolit a zazan. masabocoyay kohkoh singangan aca to masabocoyay kohkoha anocaay sa masataliyokay ko kamocoy a kohkoh, koki' ka adidi'ay to kimolmolan kohkoh nika masatanayo' ko koki', tapiingan a bocoy, o koki' doodoota ko kaladaway anocaay sa sakolakolahan ko kaladaway, 2.5cm ko talakaw no koki'. kaliwaliwah i kananaman kaliwaliwah no kohkoh mahamin izaw i kitakit, maazih to i Uw-cow, Ya-cow, Bey-cow Tong- Nan-ya ato Pey-me-cow a nowalian ato Ko-pa a kakitizaan a saowac, tako ato lako liwliw no abesaay a nanom. tono wawa sa. manamoh ko kohkoh maozip i lanolano'an, i labo no nanom damay anocaay sa o laclac mala o kakanen. ozip no olang kawili a ngawa' o sapitakis to ozang. i bili misati'kok. misalalami' miciyan to kohkoh o kanamohan no Cow-kow notimolan asoay a kakanan. Kowng-si Liw-cow walay a kohkoh o nisakabian a kohkoh. nika no canacanan ko sapalamel, kanca ngaayen ko kohkoh, sakasaan a malalid no cilekay. amalaheci . Taywan naoyaan o "kimolmolay kohkoh" amalaheci ko nidipat pipahabayan, taneng henay a yadah ko nipahabanay, nipahabanay katokoh siwa a kacakat. ayzaay to a mihcaan Nong-wi-hoy pipahabayan sakalamkam sa mikawaw misoped pahabay to sapaloma sa, nacila (cacay a demiad) pasobana' malaheci to ko nipahabay to kimolmolay kohkohk, yadah sato ko kohkoh, o nipahabayay kacakat katokoh i siwaay. imahin pipahabayan patahkal a pacakay to canacananan a kohkohan, mibangbang to binawlan mikawaw pahabay anocaay pakayadah to kohkoh, anoayaw adasay mala o cayay to ka azih i Taywan, o siacaay a nilaco no oyaayay to no maozipay, katokoh to nipahabay ato nipacakay asinilacol to. . caay ko nipasapaiyoan ato no taoay a kohkoh, kimolmolay a kohkoh omahay zomaay a kohkoh maselep to. . kimolmolay kohkoh no Taywan tabakiay no yaanay to abesaay nanom a kohkoh, satabakiay katokoh 7-8 honan, imahini o makanay to no tademaw amin o masabocoyay kimolmolay kohkoh, o satabakiay a ozip 3-4 honan dada'. pipahabayan a mikeliday ci Cen-cin-zo hini sa, makay "cacay a kohkoh siwa kaysing ko kabi" oynian a kamo taneng maazihay to, iayaw kimolmolay kohkoh no Taywan o kahenolan no nanomay a kakanan. sangaleh malokay syakayay mahizato, ayzaay to a mihcaan namapatadas no tademaw, masazoma to ko liwliw caay to kaazih ko no tiniay to noyaanay to nanomay maozipay no taoay aca a kohkoh. sato, pipahabayay kalamkam sato mikawaw to kimolmolay kohkoh, kahenolan a misopet to tiniay maozipay i nanom, misoped pahabay. iayaw kimolmolay kohkoh angangan maozip i tako, kapison a lako ato nipalomaan to tipos a omah. pipahabayay sakatosa no mikeliday mitelacay a tademaw ci Cen-kown-zo pipodac niza o kimolmolay kohkoh tosa ko angangan kahini kalamkam a masele, saka cacay malokay ko azihen, pasapaiyo mapaoning to ko nanom caay to kaozip ko kohkohk, sakatosa bo-so'-lo a kohkohan macacabi' to no taoay a maozipay, o kalamkam a siwawa sa, cacay ko bo-so'-lo cacay a mihcaan nilecohan tolo a mangan ko kohkoh, cacay ko kimolmolay kohkoh cacay a mihcaan 200 dada' ko nilecohan a kohkoh. iayaw "ayaw no 1971 a mihcaan" i omah yadah ko pisapodan to kakanan a kohkoh, mipodac itawya taneng a mahini sa. kasomamadanay a cilis i kaelacad izaw to konisoped to nanom, caay padamek henay ato caay henay pisapaiyo. kahenolan o kakoti' no nanom, malecaday a cilis, sadingsingan, balangbangan tosa a poo' kasikohkohan, o lalod kalahadan no bo-sow-lo. sayhan o kohkoh o tatongos pahabay o akoti' i 23-28℃. pahabayan a kakitizaan kohkoh icelang ko nikaozip ato icelang mitena' to imelang, i sinanomay a cilis, lako, tako taneng mipazeng pahabay, o zoma i tako han pahabay, misabacalbacal to tako tabakiay adidi'ay pasasizoma pahabay, tamelacay a tako, nisolimetan a tako ko sapahabay, o tesek no kailabo labo kacacayat to akoti' no kasienawan kasapi' no lalod. nika paayaw to kaliyohan a sapacilal, o kailabo no nanom sakapahay i 70cm, mahiza sa pasalilel ko liwliw, sacaay pilaliw no kohkoh. i hekal no nanom taneng pahabay to monabaway a lotok, kakanan no kohkoh, sa pahecek han i teban to aok sazepitan no damay molangaw, kakanan no kohkoh, papahanhanan no kohkoh ato kasiti'kokan. pahabay to sapal a kawaw nanilisimetay ko tako, o zoma mipili' i 4-11 a bolad malingato pahabay to sapol. paymihcaan to 6-9 a bolad o poo' no kasibekan no kohkoh a siti'kok, katokoh i Nan-tow a kowan Po-li a saowac anocaay sa tayza i Po-li a iciba micakay to kimolmolay a kohkoh. kilol to nipalalecad 2:1 ko ozang olang, pakayni i pipili' to 15-20g ko ozang a kohkoh pazeng han i tako, payli-bang-mi ko nanom pazeng han to 10 a kohkohan ozang a kohkoh taneng to, adidi'ay a kohkoh caliway to cacay a mihcaan konipahabay taneng to alaen pacakay. malalitin to ihekalay ato zomaay a natinengan
